contentrichtext.text: {{ref improve|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Bekkevoort |picture= |picture-legend= |map=BekkevoortLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Bekkevoort in Flemish Brabant |arms=Blason Bekkevoort.svg |flag=Flag of Bekkevoort.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-VB}} |arrondissement=[[Leuven administrative Arrondissement|Leuven]] |nis=24008 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Hans Vandenberg (CD&V) |majority= [[CD&V]], [[sp.a]] |postal-codes=3460, 3461 |telephone-area=013, 016 |web=[http://www.bekkevoort.be/ www.bekkevoort.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=57 |lon_deg=04 |lon_min=58 }} '''Bekkevoort''' is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Flemish Brabant]]. The municipality comprises the towns of [[Assent (Belgium)|Assent]], Bekkevoort proper and [[Molenbeek-Wersbeek]]. On January 1, 2006 Bekkevoort had a total population of 5,826. The total area is 37.17 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 157 inhabitants per km². ==References== {{reflist}} {{Flemish Brabant}} [[Category:Municipalities of Flemish Brabant]] {{FlemishBrabant-geo-stub}}
